languages.text: "В циклах предутвержденных... затаился изъян... почитания..." {n}Тело техножреца сотрясают конвульсии, {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g} издает жалобный, болезненный скрип бинарных молитв. И с каждым мгновением сигнал этот становится все менее разборчивым, будто нечто искривленное и неправильное примешивается к нему.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "В циклах предутвержденных... затаился изъян... почитания..." {n}Тело техножреца сотрясают конвульсии, {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g} издает жалобный, болезненный скрип бинарных молитв. И с каждым мгновением сигнал этот становится все менее разборчивым, будто нечто искривленное и неправильное примешивается к нему.{/n}

languages.text: "In the cycles of the foreordained... there lurks a flaw... of worship..." {n}The Tech-Priest's body convulses. Pained, plaintive creaks of binharic prayers come from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. As moments pass, the signal becomes less and less clear, as if something twisted and wrong were being added to it.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В циклах предутвержденных... затаился изъян... почитания..." {n}Тело техножреца сотрясают конвульсии, {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g} издает жалобный, болезненный скрип бинарных молитв. И с каждым мгновением сигнал этот становится все менее разборчивым, будто нечто искривленное и неправильное примешивается к нему.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "In the preset cycles— there lurks a flaw— of worship..." {n}The Tech-Priest's body convulses. Pained, plaintive creaks of binary prayers come from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. As moments pass, the signal becomes less and less clear, as though something twisted and wrong were being admixed to it.{/n}

"In the preset cycles— there lurks a flaw— of worship..." {n}The Tech-Priest's body convulses. Pained, plaintive creaks of binary prayers come from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. As moments pass, the signal becomes less and less clear, as though something twisted and wrong were being admixed to it.{/n}

As moments pass, the signal becomes less and less clear, as if something twisted and wrong were being admixed to it.{/n}

As moments pass, the signal becomes less and less clear, as if something twisted and wrong were being added to it.{/n}

"In the cycles of the foreordained... there lurks a flaw... of worship..." {n}The Tech-Priest's body convulses. Pained, plaintive creaks of binary prayers come from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. As moments pass, the signal becomes less and less clear, as if something twisted and wrong were being added to it.{/n}

languages.text: "In den Schaltkreisen der Vorherbestimmung, lauert ein Makel ... der Makel der Anbetung ..." {n}Der Körper des Techpriesters zuckt. Schmerzverzerrte, klagende binhärische Gebete ertönen knarzend aus seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}. Das Signal wird immer undeutlicher, als würde ihm etwas Verdrehtes, Falsches hinzugefügt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "In the cycles of the foreordained... there lurks a flaw... of worship..." {n}The Tech-Priest's body convulses. Pained, plaintive creaks of binharic prayers come from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. As moments pass, the signal becomes less and less clear, as if something twisted and wrong were being added to it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "In den Schaltkreisen der Vorherbestimmung, lauert ein Makel ... der Makel der Anbetung ..." {n}Der Körper des Techpriesters zuckt. Schmerzverzerrte, klagende Binärgebete ertönen knarzend aus seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. Das Signal wird immer undeutlicher, als würde etwas Verdrehtes, Falsches hineingemischt werden.{/n}

languages.text: « Dans les cycles des prédestinés... il y a une faiblesse... d'adoration... » {n}Le corps du technoprêtre est pris de convulsions. Son {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} émet des couinements plaintifs et douloureux de prières binhaires. Au fur et à mesure, le signal se fait de moins en moins clair, comme si quelque chose s'y ajoutait, déformant et corrompant le message.{/n}
languages.original_text: "In the cycles of the foreordained... there lurks a flaw... of worship..." {n}The Tech-Priest's body convulses. Pained, plaintive creaks of binharic prayers come from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. As moments pass, the signal becomes less and less clear, as if something twisted and wrong were being added to it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Dans les cycles des prédestinés, il y a une faiblesse... d'adoration. » {n}Le corps du technoprêtre est pris de convulsions. Son {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} émet des couinements plaintifs et douloureux de prières binhaires. Au fur et à mesure, le signal se fait de moins en moins clair, comme si quelque chose s'y ajoutait, déformant et corrompant le message.{/n}

languages.text: “在命定的循环中……潜伏着崇拜的……缺陷……”{n}技术神甫身体抽搐着，他的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置发出痛苦、哀怨的二进制祈祷声。随着时间的流逝，他的祷告越来越模糊，似乎有某种扭曲和谬误渗入其中。{/n}
languages.original_text: "In the cycles of the foreordained... there lurks a flaw... of worship..." {n}The Tech-Priest's body convulses. Pained, plaintive creaks of binharic prayers come from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. As moments pass, the signal becomes less and less clear, as if something twisted and wrong were being added to it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “在命定的循环中……潜伏着崇拜的……缺陷……”{n}技术祭司身体抽搐着，他的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置发出痛苦、哀怨的二进制祈祷声。随着时间的流逝，他的祷告越来越模糊，似乎有某种扭曲和谬误渗入其中。{/n}

languages.text: 「定められたサイクルには欠陥が潜んでいる…崇拝の欠陥が…」{n}技術司祭の体がピクピクと動く。男の{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}から、キーキーと痛み嘆く2進数の祈りが聞こえる。祈りが終わると、信号はどんどん聞き取りにくくなっていく。まるで何か歪んだおかしなものを混ぜ込んでいるようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "In the cycles of the foreordained... there lurks a flaw... of worship..." {n}The Tech-Priest's body convulses. Pained, plaintive creaks of binharic prayers come from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. As moments pass, the signal becomes less and less clear, as if something twisted and wrong were being added to it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「定められたサイクルには — 欠陥が潜んでいる…崇拝の欠陥が…」{n}技術司祭の体がピクピクと動く。男の{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}から、キーキーと痛み嘆く2進数の祈りが聞こえる。祈りが終わると、信号はどんどん聞き取りにくくなり、まるで何か歪んだおかしなものを混ぜ込んでいるようだ。{/n}

languages.text: «En los ciclos de lo predestinado... hay un defecto... de adoración...». {n}El cuerpo del tecnosacerdote convulsiona. Crujidos doloridos y quejosos brotan de su {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}. Conforme pasa el tiempo, la señal se distorsiona gradualmente, como si algo retorcido e incorrecto le fuera añadido.{/n}
languages.original_text: "In the cycles of the foreordained... there lurks a flaw... of worship..." {n}The Tech-Priest's body convulses. Pained, plaintive creaks of binharic prayers come from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. As moments pass, the signal becomes less and less clear, as if something twisted and wrong were being added to it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «En los ciclos de los predeterminados acecha un defecto de adoración...». {n}El cuerpo del tecnosacerdote convulsiona. De su {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} salen crujidos doloridos y lastimeros de plegarias binarias. A medida que pasan los momentos, la señal se vuelve cada vez menos clara, como si algo extraño y retorcido se mezclara con ella.{/n}

languages.text: "Mukadder döngülerde... İbadetin kendisinde... Bir kusur pusuda bekliyor..." {n}Tekno Rahip'in vücudu kasılıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voksundan{/g} yürek burkan, acı dolu cızırtılar hâlinde ikili dil duaları yükseliyor. Sinyal, anbean berraklığını yitirip yerini, sapkın ve yanlış bir şeye bırakıyormuş izlenimi yaratıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "In the cycles of the foreordained... there lurks a flaw... of worship..." {n}The Tech-Priest's body convulses. Pained, plaintive creaks of binharic prayers come from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. As moments pass, the signal becomes less and less clear, as if something twisted and wrong were being added to it.{/n}
